expect.label: Use column headers as IDs of the columns

mapper.content:
SURA

Automated Surplus Food Redistribution Alert

Hello {{8.`1`}},

A new food donation request has been submitted by a restaurant near you. Your NGO has been selected as the first responder.

Donation Request Details

Restaurant{{14.restaurant}}
Contact{{14.contact}}
Location{{14.location}}
Food Type{{14.foodType}}
Quantity{{14.quantity}} meals
Pickup Window{{14.expiry}}
Notes{{14.notes}}
Quick Response Needed: Food must be collected within the time window.

Please confirm your decision:

Accept Pickup Decline Request

If no response is received within the deadline, the request will automatically be forwarded to the next available NGO.

Regards,
SURA

2026 SURA Connect Automation for Social Good
Built for reducing food waste & improving NGO coordination
mapper.subject: New Food Donation Request Assigned
